By using Water, Bug, and Ghost Gems the Blue Flute increases the player's EV Yield. == Details == Blue Flute increases the player's EV Yield by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 22%, with an achievement bonus of 1000%.
